reason: As a Facchino citizen focused on building my small fortune through diligent work and my growing warehouse business, initiating a conversation with Feola007 is paramount. Her ownership of the public dock on Giudecca makes her a central figure in the very activities that define my livelihood. I aim to offer my reliable services for port operations and explore opportunities for storage contracts at my warehouse, thereby strengthening our professional relationship and demonstrating my value to a key economic player in Venice, which is crucial for my long-term growth and influence.
